stateDiagram

STOP

STOP : STOP

STOP : enter / #123; Motor_STOP_enter(sm)#59; #125;

STOP : exit / #123; Motor_STOP_exit(sm)#59; #125;

STOP : do / #123; Motor_STOP_do(sm)#59; #125;

LEFT_MOVE

LEFT_MOVE : LEFT_MOVE

LEFT_MOVE : enter / #123; Motor_LEFT_MOVE_enter(sm)#59; #125;

LEFT_MOVE : exit / #123; Motor_LEFT_MOVE_exit(sm)#59; #125;

LEFT_MOVE : do / #123; Motor_LEFT_MOVE_do(sm)#59; #125;

LEFT_MOVE_MAX

LEFT_MOVE_MAX : LEFT_MOVE_MAX

LEFT_MOVE_MAX : enter / #123; Motor_LEFT_MOVE_MAX_enter(sm)#59; #125;

LEFT_MOVE_MAX : exit / #123; Motor_LEFT_MOVE_MAX_exit(sm)#59; #125;

LEFT_MOVE_MAX : do / #123; Motor_LEFT_MOVE_MAX_do(sm)#59; #125;

RIGHT_MOVE

RIGHT_MOVE : RIGHT_MOVE

RIGHT_MOVE : enter / #123; Motor_RIGHT_MOVE_enter(sm)#59; #125;

RIGHT_MOVE : exit / #123; Motor_RIGHT_MOVE_exit(sm)#59; #125;

RIGHT_MOVE : do / #123; Motor_RIGHT_MOVE_do(sm)#59; #125;

RIGHT_MOVE_MAX

RIGHT_MOVE_MAX : RIGHT_MOVE_MAX

RIGHT_MOVE_MAX : enter / #123; Motor_RIGHT_MOVE_MAX_enter(sm)#59; #125;

RIGHT_MOVE_MAX : exit / #123; Motor_RIGHT_MOVE_MAX_exit(sm)#59; #125;

RIGHT_MOVE_MAX : do / #123; Motor_RIGHT_MOVE_MAX_do(sm)#59; #125;

%% Initial state name as "." so that it fits in black circle shape.
%% See https://github.com/StateSmith/StateSmith/issues/404
state "." as ROOT.(InitialState)

STOP --> LEFT_MOVE : LEFT_MOVE

STOP --> RIGHT_MOVE : RIGHT_MOVE

LEFT_MOVE --> RIGHT_MOVE : RIGHT_MOVE

LEFT_MOVE --> STOP : STOP

LEFT_MOVE --> LEFT_MOVE_MAX : LEFT_MOVE_MAX

LEFT_MOVE_MAX --> RIGHT_MOVE : RIGHT_MOVE

LEFT_MOVE_MAX --> STOP : STOP

RIGHT_MOVE --> LEFT_MOVE : LEFT_MOVE

RIGHT_MOVE --> STOP : STOP

RIGHT_MOVE --> RIGHT_MOVE_MAX : RIGHT_MOVE_MAX

RIGHT_MOVE_MAX --> LEFT_MOVE : LEFT_MOVE

RIGHT_MOVE_MAX --> STOP : STOP

ROOT.(InitialState) --> STOP
Events
settings
